import React from 'react' export default function BookCard(props) { const bookcardstyle = { display: "flex", justifyContent: 'center', backgroundColor: 'orange', font: 'black', color: 'white', padding: '10px', fontsize: '1.25rem', textDecoration:"none", }; return (

{props.title}

{props.subtitle}

{props.author}

{props.date}

{props.description}

Google Book link to: {props.title}
) }
